roleset.name: have a consequence

example.name: proper usage, apparently
example.text: The law could redound to the advantage of brokers and banks, who incur high administrative costs to deliver securities to investors.
example.arg: to the advantage of brokers and banks, who incur high administrative costs to deliver securities to investors.

roleset.note: REDOUND-V NOTES: OK, I had to look this one up. Not part of my vocabulary. (from redound.01-v)
